attributes.action: Publicly acknowledge that Enoch Powell was right to say what he did in his 1968 speech.
attributes.additional_details: Now that two of the most prominent and hugely respected politicians of the last 40 or so years have said that immigration has been bad for Britain THEY have confirmed that Enoch Powell was right in the forecasts he made in 1968.  It is only morally right, therefore, that the senior politician of our day, the Prime Minister, publicly acknowledges that it was wrong to have vilified him in the way he was vilified
